gyms.description: BA Athletics Inc. is located just minutes off of the Centerville exit in Lancaster, PA.   Our new 4,500 square foot facility houses Strongman, Powerlifting, CrossFit, and Youth Sports programs all under one roof.   Our Strongman implements are outfitted by Rogue, CFF, and Landrich Power Systems... 2 yokes, 3 pairs of farmer's handles, 2 metal logs, 2 circus DBs, 2 power cages and 2 oly platforms.   We also have kegs up to 300#, stones up to 400#, tires up to 800#, 2" hollow and solid axles, 2 prowlers, and a loadable hussafel.  Multiple 50 ft indoor lanes for head-to-head events too.   Monthly memberships, punch passes, and daily drop-in rates available on our website.   We also host and compete in NAS sanctioned competitions... come join the strongest gym in central PA!

gyms.name: NBS Fitness
gyms.description:
NBS Fitness offers memberships to anyone interested in training at the most badass gym in the Mid-South. With 24 hour access you can get after it 24 hours a day, 365 days a year (even on holidays).

    We take pride in having the best equipment available to our members with a full powerlifting setup, a full strongman setup, and a full olympic lifting setups with plenty of machines and free weights for bodybuilders, fitness and figure competitors, and general fitness clients as well. Our equipment comes from top of the line companies like EliteFTS, Legend, and Hammer Strength.

    The environment at NBS Fitness is unlike any other facility around. We like to put our members in an environment that is highly conducive to results. We play hard rock, metal, and rap over our top of the line sound system and keep the environment competitive and friendly at the same time. At no other gym will you find a more diverse and encouraging group of members.

    The knowledge at NBS Fitness is unmatched. All of our trainers are highly educated and competitive athletes and our gym is full of dedicated individuals who are constantly educating themselves. If you are looking to learn more, this is the gym you need to be at.

    We keep our memberships simple: $55 a month, no sign up fee, no long term contract, and we take payments through autpay.

gyms.name: Results Gym
gyms.description:
Results Gym has been established for 10 years in Aberdeen. In that time, Results has become Aberdeens No1 independent gym for people who are serious and passionate about weight training.
Because the owners of results are deeply passionate about what we do, and because we have over 40 years combined experience in weight training, we can offer the right advice on training schedules, routines and diets.
Our members include the current and 3 times British Natural Body Building Champion, PNBA World Natural Body Building runner up, Scotland's Strongest Man junior runner up, Scottish NABBA Junior runner up, Scotland UKBFF Junior champion, Aberdeens Strongest Man Novice runner up, Scottish NABBA Ladies Figure Toned class runner up and British and Scottish Masters weight lifting champion.
And of course we have the 2007 Mr Universe Graham Park who is always on hand to offer and share his wealth of experience.
We also stock a large range of supplements, and we are the ONLY approved stockist in the North East of Scotland for Extreme Nutrition and Maximum Performance.
So if you are looking for a no nonsense, no frills, down to basics gym then look no further than Results Gym!
Find out more on our facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ResultsGymAberdeen?ref=hl

gyms.address: 5610 Memorial Ave. North, #4  Oak Park Heights, MN 55082
gyms.description:
We offer a wide range of classes including:  CrossFit, Zumba, BootCamp, Yoga, High School Happy Hour, Open Gym and Strongman.  There is something for everybody at CrossFit WorkHouse.  We offer classes at convenient times to accommodate your busy schedule.
Strongman training involves building overall strength, and training with competition implements to gain familiarity.  It is necessary to train the entire body for strength, especially with variants of the squat, dead lift, and overhead press.  Also important is explosive power, developed by weightlifting-style lifts, and cardiovascular conditioning.  Grip strength must also be developed.  Like any sport, it is necessary to train using the equipment one encounters in the sport.  In the case of strongman, CrossFit WorkHouse utilizes the following implements:  logs, tires, yokes, farmer's walk implements, kegs, sleds, stones, etc.  Go to the Schedule Page to sign up for the next available class.

It's ran by Matt Reynolds Pro Strongman and Strength Coach, Paden Stringer, and Will McNeely.  We are unique and radically different from every other fitness club/gym in the area because we focus on STRENGTH as the primary basis of functional health, body recomposition, and athletic and sport performance. We forge strength through basic barbell and bodyweight training that is simple and effective, but grounded in hard, yet rewarding work, impeccable form, and injury prevention. Our owners/managers/trainers are highly educated, nationally-recognized top coaches in the field of strength and conditioning, as well as elite-level athletes and competitive lifters, themselves.

gyms.name: Powerhouse Gym
gyms.description:
THE POWERHOUSE has been in Wellington for 18 years. Established in 1988 in the back of a Demolition Yard we provided a rugged training environment for the true hard gainer. Our equipment came from gyms that closed down and other pieces were built in our workshop. Our membership never exceeded more than 40.

Our first area was about 400 sq feet as we inherited more equipment we expanded to 800 then to 1200 sq feet. Then our lease ran out and here we are now 4,000 sq feet to play with. Our culture and environment is what The Powerhouse wants others to experience.

We are a no frills gym, our fees reflect this as you are not paying for areas that you would not use as in the larger Fitness Centres. Being a Free Weight gym and not Machine Based we do not have to keep up with latest trends, technologies or designs. Free Weights emphasises Core Stability which you will not get from Machine based gyms.

Our equipment is not state of the art but tried and tested and will handle all Body types Large or Small Heavy or Light.

gyms.name: IronSport
gyms.description:
Iron Sport Gym was founded in 1995 by Steve and Joe Pulcinella as a haven for local weightlifters and powerlifters. They knew enough people that were tired of the lame ‘health club’ scene that would join them on the quest to build the ultimate gym. The early premise was to have a really great facility for the lifter operated by the lifter. Nearly twenty years later, Iron Sport continues to build a unique strength community in the Philadelphia area.

The gym is fully equipped for all types of strength training including powerlifting, Olympic weightlifting, strongman, Highland Games, and even CrossFit. We have 3 power racks, 1 single squat rack, 3 portable squat stands, 5 Olympic platforms, 4 benches, dumbbells up to 160#, 5 sets of Werk-San Olympic bumper plates, thousands of pounds of metal York plates, basic cardio equipment (just in case), a full assortment of Hammer Strength and Life Fitness machines, and a garage full of strongman implements you won’t find anywhere else. We also offer personal training for any strength discipline.

gyms.name: Hybrid Athletics
gyms.description:
Hybrid Athletics focuses on strength and conditioning for experienced and inexperienced athletes. Hybrid Athletes learn proper form and conditioning; creating an athlete that is faster, stronger and healthier. 
 
Hybrid Athletics' classes are coached by Grant Statton, USA Weightlifting Sports Performance Coach. Grant is also a former professional Rugby player and understands the importance of being a well-rounded athlete to excel in all areas of athleticism. His passion for helping people embrace their inner athlete is evident in every class. 
 
General Cross Training Classes - Olympic Weightlifting Classes - Sprint Training - Heavy Throwing - Strongman - Figure Competitions - Private Lessons - KidFit

gyms.name: Badger CrossFit

We achieve this through weightlifting, sprinting, gymnastics, powerlifting, kettlebell training, strongman, plyometrics, rowing, medicine ball training and more.

Training takes place outside, so dress appropriately. Implements I currently have:

175# (unloaded) 8" Steel Log
350# & 600# Tires
275# Fire Hydrant
100# (unloaded) Farmers Walk
100# Cannonball
165, 220, 242, 264, 286 & 315# Atlas Stones
2 3/8" Axel
A couple of rusty Oly bars and various steel plates

It's not the prettiest set up, but if you want to work hard, have fun, and don't mind getting a little dirty then this is the place to be! Email, call or text me, Rob Sheldon, for more information and/or to be added to our Facebook Strongman group.

gyms.name: CrossFit Center City
gyms.description:
CrossFit Center City was established in January of 2009 in the heart of Center City, Philadelphia making us the first and oldest affiliate in Philly. We began in a tiny space with four pull-up bar spots and twelve sandbags. Today the gym has now grown into a community that boasts over 300 members, the most broadly educated and experienced full-time coaching staff in the city, and a stellar layout of classes meant to make you better at life, CrossFit, and all kinds of specializations: running and rowing, CrossFit Regionals Training, a nationally competitive Olympic weightlifting team, nutrition, gymnastics, restorative yoga, strongman, and corrective movement classes that keep you training for the rest of your life.

It has always been our goal at CFCC to do our very best to keep our athletes fit for whatever it is they really want to do; whether that’s lifting a grandchild, running a marathon, or competing in the CrossFit Games. It is our firm belief that learning to move well and often does more than change bodies, it changes lives! That said, if you’re interested in giving us a try - or at least a deeper look - start here, and contact us to set up a free consultation! Email us at info@crossfitcc.com or give us a call at 267-909-8210.

gyms.name: ICON
gyms.description:
https://vimeo.com/user1797845     MS,CSCS,USAW,USATF,CES,NSCA-CPT — Exercise Physiologist, Master Trainer, Speed-Strength-Conditioning Specialist, Owner
Bachelors Degree in Health Education
Bachelors Degree in Exercise Science
Graduate Degree in Exercise Physiology
·NSCA Certified Strength and Conditioning Specialist
·USA Weightlifting Club Coach Level 1
·USA Track & Field Club Coach Level 1
·ACE Certified Clinical Exercise Specialist
·NSCA Certified Personal Fitness Trainer
·National Strength & Conditioning Association Alabama State Chairman
·State, National and World ranked competitive powerlifter
·Member of the American College of Sports Medicine

Jeff Green possesses over 21 years experience in the realm of sports and personal fitness training. He wrestled and ran track all through junior and high school and walked on at Clemson University to wrestle for Coach Henson, one of the south’s last wrestling programs. Upon graduating from the University of Alabama in Birmingham, with two undergraduate and one graduate degree all within the sports/fitness industry, Jeff continued his pursuit of excellence by acquiring every certification in the industries having anything to do with developing world-class athletes. Jeff is one of the most driven competitors ever to work in this field and he knows how to coax these same qualities out of his clients. He also has successfully competed in all of the ‘strength sports’ including national & state champion in powerlifting, state champion and nationally ranked in Strongman, competitive Olympic weightlifting, and state and one-time nationally ranked competitive bodybuilding.

Back in 1986, he then started one of several successful sports and personal fitness training companies and finally with Icon Performance has established himself a reputation of excellence in state-of-the-art training methodologies, tried and true dieting strategies, ‘under-the-bar’ and ‘in-the-trenches’ mental focus which all together produce consistent consistent results. To this day, Jeff Green is regarded as one of the top-rated personal trainers and strength coaches in the country, with speaking engagements and demonstrations spanning the country as well as the state of Alabama.

He has trained and consulted top level athletes from every sport including; Evan Mathis, Alabama Crimson Tide All-Conference, All-Academic four year starter Right Guard, who now plays offensive line for the Carolina Panthers, David Ross, All-State and All-Metro, top national prospect for offensive linemen has signed with the Alabama Crimson Tide and will start his freshman year as Center, Cortland Finnegan, Defensive Back/Tailback and Punt Return Specialist, Samford University’s only three time All-American, who finished with a spectacular performance at his College Pro-Day debut with a 4.32 and 4.29 40 yard dash and a 44 inch vertical jump, and lastly, Cory White, Running Back for UAB, who is now training for the NFL’s Pro Day.

Jeff’s reputation has grown nationwide as a speed, strength and power training authority with an ability to get real results-real fast.

gyms.name: Bear Strength Athletics Gym
gyms.description:
Bear Strength Athletics is a group that focuses on getting strong in a supportive environment with elite-level coaching. Group leader and Coach, Madison Malfa, leads small group classes through Strongman and Powerlifting-inspired training, designed to achieve your goals and get you big, strong and totally badass. Small, Fun, Group classes allow for lots of personal attention for achieving optimal techniques and the best results while preventing injury. 

-Get strong with others in a supportive environment to maximize your gains and push yourself to the next level. 

-All levels are welcome whether you plan to compete or just want to be a strong badass. 

-Use unique tools such as logs, giant dumbbells, sleds and more to build brutal real-world strength and size, while having tons of fun, building tons of muscle and getting ridiculously strong.

-Get bigger and stronger utilizing fun and intense methods in a supportive group environment to achieve you goals fast. 

-Use Big Compound movements, special tools and intensity techniques to scorch off fat and build muscle. 

-Bulletproof yourself against injury by utilizing corrective methods to keep your body in balance. 

-Utilize the Bear Strength Method to get big, strong and unstoppable. 

Madison Malfa is a NASM certified Personal trainer, Sports Performance and Corrective exercise Training Specialist. He is also a certified Strongman Performance Trainer by World's Strongest Man Competitor Derek Poundstone. Madison also has a B.S in Mechanical Engineering with a focus in Biomechanics

gyms.name: Full Circle Strength
gyms.description:
Locally owned, Full Circle Strength Systems is not your ordinary gym! Although we do have equipment such as dumbbells, kettle bells, and bench presses like your typical gym, Mitch and Lacee wanted to create a one of a kind gym that incorporated powerlifting and strongman aspects. In their gym, you can expect to see equipment that will push you to your limits. Full Circle Strength Systems incorporates equipment such as large tractor tires, rope climbs, sleds, atlas stones, yokes, frames, and so much more! We are proud to say we also carry Olympic weights.
They created a gym where a person can workout out as loud as they want, lift as heavy as they want, and workout how they want. We are equipped with OVER 8 squat/deadlift stations where we encourage people to drop weights, we have OVER 50 45lb plates, and love the use of chalk! 
We want to invite anyone and everyone into our gym. Though we are based with the idea of strongman, ultimately we want to invite anyone who has a passion for gaining muscle mass, competing, experiencing strongman events, powerlifting, or anyone who is starting to take steps into a healthier lifestyle.
